channel.title: Vote for cash,
channel.description:
Heey, its me burntoath.. again :\ uhm well Im trying to help the owner of deadly pking again, and since servers that seem to have alot of votes, have/get more players, well since the owner of deadly pking is kinda really busy... I wanted to figure out a way to maby make a vote for cash system, like that when you vote for our server you recieve something like 10m cash ingame? see im not the greatest with connecting the source with websites, soooo can anyone maby put me on the right path or completely help me make one?
thanks, from burntoath and the rest of the deadly pking community :D
